projects.Math Solver: Researched and strategized in a team-environment for new beta product implementation. Service to solve mathematical equations and provide step by step analyst of solution.
projects.WYSIWYG: Implemented featured product for flashcard site monitization. Enhanced CKEditor WYSIWYG (What You See Is What You Get) editor and created server security filters.
projects.HTML5 Viewer: Researcehed and implemented pdf2htmlEX with soffice to convert uploaded essay documents into HTML5 and enhance user experience.
projects.Language Detection: Researched and implemented Google's Compact Language Detector 2 (CLD) library with flashcard site to support Text-To-Speech feature integration.

projects.Amazon Cloud Migration: Led migration of legacy servers to Amazon Cloud services reducing server costs by about 40%.
projects.Web Portals: Developed and implemented a custom Joomla content management system (CMS) site to act as the Client and Marketing Staff interface to the company partnered Policy Enterprise software.
projects.ProtegeMex Prototype v2: Implemented a second prototype website ported from v1 adding new features to streamline content updates by Sales Team. Added i18n internationalization, and implemented custom CMS.
projects.ProtegeMex Prototype v1: Prototyped an Insurance Policy Management web app adding a new line of business. A system that allows Customers and Agents to quote, purchase, review, re-new, endorse, and cancel their insurance policies.
projects.SysAdmin: Was promoted after 2 months to take over management of local Windows Hyper-V 2008 servers.

projects.Inventory Manager: Created a web app to manage general, electronics, and keys inventories streamlining staff operations.
projects.Absence Calendar: Reduced filing errors by creating a web app to track paper form submissions of teacher absences.
projects.Assessment: Provided Admin Staff a streamlined process to collect assessment data on teachers through a custom web app.

projects.Superb Registrar: Increased user retention rates by re-writing workflow logic of existing Domain Registrar web app.

education.title: Bachelor in Computer Science - University of Hawai`i, Manoa
